rounds of white don t cut white and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in black knit k2 p2 for 3 more rounds in black 4 total rounds of black don t cut black and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in yellow knit k2 p2 for 1 more round in yellow 2 total rounds of yellow cut yellow knit 1 round of plain stockinette in white knit k2 p2 for 1 more round in white 2 total rounds of white cut white knit 1 round of plain stockinette in black knit k2 p2 for 4 more rounds in black 5 total rounds of black leg knit stockinette in the color of the final stripe blue for hollander and black for rozanov until sock leg measures 2 or desired length heel flap knit across the first 28 32 36 40 stitches you will now begin working flat across your heel stitches row 1 k2 sl 1 k1 to bor turn work slip purlwise with yarn in back row 2 sl 1 purl to end of row turn work slip purlwise with yarn in front row 3 sl 1 k1 to end of row turn work slip purlwise with yarn in back repeat row 2 and row 3 working 28 32 36 40 row total in the heel flap including initial row 1 setup end after completing row 2 purl row heel turn square row 1 sl 1 k 18 20 23 25 sts ssk turn row 2 sl 1 p 10 10 12 12 sts p2tog turn row 3 sl 1 k 10 10 12 12 sts ssk turn you will continue knitting across the middle 10 10 12 12 stitches but you don t need to count after row 1 and 2 are complete you ll notice there s always a little gap created when you turn your work and you ll always be doing your ssk or p2tog with the stitches on either side of that gap to close it repeat row 2 and row 3 until you ve used up all your stitches and there are no stitches on either side to decrease there should be 12 12 14 14 sts left on your needle gusset pick up and knit 14 16 18 20 sts along the left side of your heel flap this should be one for every slipped stitch place bor marker knit across the 28 32 36 40 sts of the front of your sock pm pick up and knit 14 16 18 20 sts along the right side of your heel flap knit across your 10 10 12 12 heel sts then the 14 16 18 20 you picked up to bor round 1 decrease round knit to marker sm k1 ssk knit
